abstrac: Virtual Assistant for your Online Business (B2B Sales, Admin, Content Creation & Digital Marketing)
bio:
I can help you transform your business:

Connect with me on LinkedIn!
www.linkedin.com/in/mary-rose-p-07632794

I am a resourceful and result-driven freelance VA with over 8 years of online work experience on Upwork.
Proven ability to leverage the skills, right tools and systems, implement processes & improve techniques to generate measurable and sustainable results for an online business.
I constantly improve my craft and keep myself updated for new trends so that my clients can benefit from it. I invest my time to understand your needs, how you like things done, how you work, and basically treat the biz as my own so I can help you generate revenue, build meaningful relationships with your customers, minimize costs & make an impact!

My main area of focus are:
Startup & Investor Research on Crunchbase, Angel, TechCrunch, Owler, LinkedIn, Fools;
Market Research,
Competitive Analysis,
B2b Lead Generation,
Customer Avatar & Segmentation,
Marketing Strategy,
Customer Care & Support.

I am also capable of doing these things (I'm currently honing these skills):
Basic Graphic Design & Photo Editing (Pixlr, Illustrator),
Social Media Marketing (FB, Instagram, LinkedIn, PInterest)
Digital Marketing (E-mail Marketing, Branding, Sales Funnel, Ad Targeting, Influencer Marketing, SEO)

I'm very proficient in using of Internet, Hubspot CRM, Microsoft Office Suite, Google Suites, LinkedIn Sales Navigator/Recruiter, Social Media, lead gen and email permutation tools. 
Equipped with high-speed internet connection at home which allows me to work efficiently, run the projects smoothly with no cuts and bumps.

___Solution-oriented, competitive & acts like a rainmaker for a business.
___I can assure you all of the projects I worked for is handled in a professional way for complete accuracy 'cause if you're not satisfied, then neither am I.

To discover how we can work together, please contact me for consultation at your earliest convenience.

* I operate as an independent contractor and I do the work on my own. 
  I do not delegate my tasks to someone else (sub-con) as I value my clients' sensitive information.

* I am open to both short term & long-term engagements.

* I'm available to work in any time zone (Just give me 24 hours to adjust my daily schedule to fit yours)

* I can be contacted through Skype, Telegram & WhatsApp

======================
I constantly learn new ways to stay on top of the dynamically changing eCommerce universe. For this reason, I did not stop learning, when I completed my SEO, PPC, and eCommerce VA training from one of the top training organizations worldwide-Enablers. I have made it a point to stay in touch with 7 figure sellers through weekly online sessions with them. This is the place where I get answers to all my questions and solutions to all of the problems that may come across while managing client accounts..... 

AM I THE LAST WORD?
===================
Let's be real, no one can claim "I know it all". No one can say that there will not be any problems in the journey of an eCommerce seller.... the key lies in continuous learning, and in accepting that problems exist, then understanding the problems, and then asap get on to solving them. "I know it all" kind of attitude does not work in today's world.  So one has to be brave enough to ask for help, and connected enough to ask the right mentors.

WHY DO MY CLIENTS RE-HIRE MY SERVICES
===================================== 
My clients, for this reason alone, trust my work and allow me the freedom to manage the tasks the way they should be managed. Though I am fully capable of following SOPs if a client has a system, a funnel, or a process that is reliable. 

IF I AM SO GOOD, THEN HOW COME I DON'T HAVE ANY JOBS HISTORY HERE
===============================================================
I am working for the last 10 years but only started on Guru in 2023.

WHAT SHOULD YOU DO?
====================
My objective and that of my clients is the same...sell profitably
So let's start talking. I'm very flexible so do contact.

Flexible and negotiable. 

I can work on fixed budgets or on hourly rates. 

Feel free to contact me and suggest what would work best for you. 
You will find me very cooperative.

Based on the workload at hand at any given moment, I sometimes have to take help from my assistants/associates to meet deadlines. This would not increase any cost burden on my clients but I expect and request my clients to be understanding and cooperate...thank you.



Disclaimer: Where I do love to help and include my contributions to big things. I would require clarity on the scope, please. Let's respect that we are both here to make a profit.

abstrac: My Five Golden Principles are the constraints that manage my work: Truth, Justice, Science, Prosperity and Peace
bio:
I graduated from Aeronautical And Aerospace Engineering Department in the Faculty of Engineering from Cairo University in 2013.

Prepared my post graduate diploma in the field of Automatic Control (PLC, Pipelines design, Valves selection, Graduation project: "Constant & Variable Chilled Water Piping Systems (head losses, control loop & energy costs)" in 2015

Now I am preparing my Master Degree about: "Transient Analysis of Gas Genrator Hybrid Rocket Engines" expected in 2021.

I worked as a Technical Office engineer responsible for the manufacturing and design process of Air Handling Units used in Central Air Conditioning in 2014

Then I worked as a Project Engineer for the design process and implementation and testing for Conveyor system in many production factories (Design for conveyor system production line of the Bakers of Croissants production in OLE trademark.) in 2016.

Now I am working as a Mechanical Design Engineer for Structure Subsystem of Satellites and Any related Mechanical Ground Support Equipment in 2018 till now.

Good Quality of work and Technical writings, Commitment of my clients profit and help max. as possible, Commitment to deliver work before deadline and To support for any feedback you need to help you in any additional service for related to any previous work I made for you.

bio:
My name is Nadine Senior. I am a Master of Arts graduate. I am excited to apply my skills to projects and employment. I am enthusiastic with a positive attitude to related tasks and open minded. I am interested in a range of work from writing to management. I have a positive attitude to related tasks, open minded, a flexible worker and I am adaptable. My skills include:

- Writing 
- Research
- Creativity

- A good proficiency in Word, Excel and Powerpoint
- social media, marketing and website building.
